content: Loomi Co. has developed an app for outdoor spaces on our planet: <style=Highlight>Planetmaker</style>.
info: 介绍户外装饰-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A观察顶处}With <style=Highlight>Planetmaker</style>, you can get a bird's-eye view of your planet and arrange outdoor facilities and landscapes as you like. Take a look at your phone. I'm sending it to you...
info: 介绍户外装饰-莫白_主流程文本3

content: I've also prepared some outdoor facilities for you. You can try using <style=Highlight>Planetmaker</style> to place them and create your own outdoor setups.
info: 介绍户外装饰-莫白_主流程文本3

content: {A抱歉}Ah, <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, I've been waiting for you. Your interior design skills have really improved. Perhaps you'd like to try decorating some of the outdoor areas next?
info: 介绍户外装饰-莫白_主流程文本3
